titleStmt.title: Of the tryu[m]phe, and the 'vses that Charles themperour, [et] the most myghty redouted kyng of England, Henry the. viii. were saluted with, passyng through London
Epigrammata. Selections. English
titleStmt.author: Lily, William, 1468?-1522.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by Richarde Pynson printer to the kyngis noble grace,

notesStmt.note: By William Lily, who is named on the last page.
A translation of the verses in honor of Charles V, from Lily's "Epigrammata".
Printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
Identified as STC 5017 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
